parameters.jsCode:
const lead = $('get_lead').item.json
const inbound = $('get_inbound').item.json
const ad = $('get_ad_names').item.json
const pixel = $('get_pixel').item.json
const set = $('set').item.json.body.data

const date = new Date(lead.created_at)

const days = [
  'Domingo',
  'Segunda-feira',
  'Terça-feira',
  'Quarta-feira',
  'Quinta-feira',
  'Sexta-feira',
  'Sábado'
]

const dayWeek = days[date.getDay()]

// Nome bruto do anuncio
const rawAdName = ad.name || ''

// placement vem do sufixo depois do til
// exemplo: "[IMG] - AD002 - Combo 02~instagram_reels"
let placement = null
let adNameClean = rawAdName

if (rawAdName.includes('~')) {
  const parts = rawAdName.split('~')
  placement = parts[parts.length - 1] || null
  adNameClean = parts.slice(0, -1).join('~')
} else {
  // fallback se algum anuncio nao tiver til
  placement = set.meta.publisher_platform || null
}

const adId = ad.id || null
const adsetName = ad.adset?.name || null
const adsetId = ad.adset?.id || null
const campaignName = ad.adset?.campaign?.name || null
const campaignId = ad.adset?.campaign?.id || null

// UTMs
const utm_source = placement

const utm_campaign = `${campaignName}`
const utm_campaign_id = campaignId

const utm_medium = `${adsetName}`
const utm_medium_id = adsetId

const utm_content = `${adNameClean}`
const utm_content_id = adId


return [{
  json: {
    // lead
    lead_id: lead.id,
    name: lead.name,
    phone: lead.phone,
    remote_jid: lead.remote_jid,
    crm: lead.crm,
    created_at: date,
    day_week: dayWeek,

    // inbound
    inbound_id: inbound.id,
    session_id: inbound.session_id,
    source_url: inbound.source_url,
    pipefy_id: inbound.pipefy_id,

    gclid: inbound.gclid,
    fbclid: inbound.fbclid,
    ctwaclid: inbound.ctwaclid,

    // UTMs
    utm_source,

    utm_medium,
    utm_medium_id,

    utm_campaign,
    utm_campaign_id,

    utm_content,
    utm_content_id,

    account_id: ad.adset?.campaign?.account_id || null,
    source_id: set.meta.sourceId || null,

    origim: set.meta.publisher_platform,

    pixel: pixel.data?.[0]?.id || null,
    pixel_name: pixel.data?.[0]?.name || null
  }
}]
